If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with the site or workshop materials, please include:

Your R version and operating system

To receive updates on new modules, public releases, or upcoming workshops, watch the GitHub repo or connect via email.

title: Data Visualization
text: This site is your interactive guide for the Data Visualization Workshop that uses R and Quarto. You‚Äôll find everything you need to learn or improve your skills, including hands-on examples, best practices, and plotting techniques, all in one place.

title: Data Visualization
text:
üéØ Workshop Goals

Learn the basics of good data visualization
Use R to learn how to wrangle and prepare data
Learn about basic, advanced, and interactive ways to plot data
Make and share your own visualizations based on Quarto

title: Data Visualization
section: üó∫Ô∏è Find your way around the workshop
text:
üó∫Ô∏è Find your way around the workshop
To look at each module, use the navigation bar above:

üìä Data Visualization Principles
Learn the basics of good visual design and what not to do.
üß¨ R Foundations
Learn how to use R syntax, clean up your data, and make your workflows neat.
üé® Plot Gallery
Look at examples that range from simple bar charts to interactive dashboards.

title: Data Visualization
section: üß™ Code and Examples in Real Time
text:
üß™ Code and Examples in Real Time
There are code snippets, rendered outputs, and downloadable datasets all over the site. You can change and play around with the code for your own projects.
